name: ikun3D
description:
Choi Chicken Basketball

A physics version of the Don't Stomp the White Block mini-game, combining some of the features of the sound game and the elimination game, very stress relieving!

Gameplay:

Click to eliminate bricks, don't let them fall into the void, and don't let the bricks with the rooster fall into the void!

Click on the top right corner to switch to basketball mode, each time you eliminate bricks will drop a basketball to hinder you, but the score is higher when you eliminate bricks!

蔡鸡篮球

一个物理版的别踩白块小游戏，结合了部分音游和消除游戏的特点，非常解压

游戏玩法：

点击消除砖块，不要让砖块掉落到虚空，更不要让带有公鸡的砖块掉落虚空！

点击右上角切换到篮球模式，每一次消除砖块会掉落一个篮球阻碍你，但是消除砖块时的得分更高！

试玩：

方法1. 点击网页最上方 Run Game

方法2. 网页下方下载 Android APK 安装包

方法3. 备用网页版链接 shao.fun/cocos/ikun/

加载可能略慢   Cocos Creator | 篮球蔡砖块 (shao.fun)

备注：

由 shaofun 在一天之内开发完成

开源链接（欢迎 star）：

HK-SHAO/ikun3D: 篮球蔡砖块小游戏 (github.com)

使用 Cocos Creator 3.5.2 开发
